MainPackage

Class BettingCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • MainPackage.BettingCenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BettingCenterInterface, java.rmi.Remote

    public class BettingCenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements BettingCenterInterface
    Manages the bets from the spectators to the broker. It contains the logic necessary for a spectator to do a bet and collect the gains and for a broker to retrieve and honour the bets made. It has a list of the bets done by the spectators, and also a list where are the ID's of all spectators that are waiting for a bet to be retrieved.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptTheBets

        public void acceptTheBets()
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used by the broker to accept all the bets from the spectators. Waits for each spectator to come to the betting center and retrieves the bets made by them. Only returns when all spectators made his bets.
        Specified by:
        acceptTheBets in interface BettingCenterInterface
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getSpectatorBetList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Bet> getSpectatorBetList()
                                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get the list of bets from the spectators
        Specified by:
        getSpectatorBetList in interface BettingCenterInterface
        Returns:
        list of bets from the spectators
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • honourTheBets

        public void honourTheBets(java.util.ArrayList<SerializableHorse> winners)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        The broker gives the reward to the winning bets. This method is called by the broker Waits for each spectator to come retrieve his bet. When they are waiting on the betting center, saves the ammount of money to give to them. Only returns when all spectators come collect their gains.
        Specified by:
        honourTheBets in interface BettingCenterInterface
        Parameters:
        winners - list of all the horses that won the race
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • placeABet

        public int placeABet(int id,
                     java.util.ArrayList<SerializableHorse> horses,
                     BettingStrategy strategy,
                     int money)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Spectator places a bet. Method used by the spectators to place a bet. It waits for the broker to be ready to receive bets. When the broker is ready, calculates the bet, based on his strategy, and adds the bet to the bet list. Returns when the broker has accepted the bet.
        Specified by:
        placeABet in interface BettingCenterInterface
        Parameters:
        id - spectator id
        horses - list of horses in a race
        strategy - spectator strategy
        money - spectator money
        Returns:
        bet amount
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • collectTheGains

        public int collectTheGains(int id)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Spectator collects the gains from the bets. Puts the spectator in the list of the spectators waiting to retrieve bets. When the broker has retrieved the bet, collects the gains given by the broker and returns them.
        Specified by:
        collectTheGains in interface BettingCenterInterface
        Parameters:
        id - spectator id
        Returns:
        money
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • serviceEnd

        public void serviceEnd()
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Stop the service and shut down the betting center.
        Specified by:
        serviceEnd in interface BettingCenterInterface
        Throws:
